ITestLogger Interface

Summary

Represents type ITestLogger.

Namespace: DUnitX.TestFramework
Inheritance Hierarchy
DUnitX.TestFramework.ITestLogger
    DUnitX.Loggers.Console.TDUnitXConsoleLogger
    DUnitX.Loggers.Null.TDUnitXNullLogger
    DUnitX.Loggers.Text.TDUnitXTextFileLogger
Syntax
Delphi
type
 ITestLogger = interface
 ['{AADCA392-421C-4060-8D47-79D7CAAB0EEF}']
 end;

The ITestLogger type exposes the following members.

Called before a Test method is run.

//called after a Fixture has run.

//allows tests to write to the log.

OnTestError(Cardinal,ITestError)

Called when a test errors.

OnTestFailure(Cardinal,ITestError)

Called when a test fails.

OnTestIgnored(Cardinal,ITestResult)

//called when a test is ignored.

OnTestingEnds(IRunResults)

//called after all fixtures have run.

OnTestingStarts(Cardinal,Cardinal,Cardinal)

Called at the start of testing. The default console logger prints the DUnitX banner.

OnTestMemoryLeak(Cardinal,ITestResult)

//called when a test memory leaks.

OnTestSuccess(Cardinal,ITestResult)

Called when a test succeeds
